price: Ẹnikẹ́ni tí ó bá ronú pìwàdà, tí ó sì ṣe iṣẹ́ rere, (kí ó mọ̀) pé dájúdájú ó ń ronú pìwàdà pátápátá sọ́dọ̀ Allāhu ni.
arabic: وَمَن تَابَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَإِنَّهُۥ يَتُوبُ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَتَابٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
